alert.note: Alert for City of Hyder (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 22 at 10:37PM AKST until February 25 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW LIKELY BEGINNING THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY... .A strengthening low will move into the gulf Thursday with an associated front moving over the panhandle Friday morning. Precipitation will begin in the Yakutat area before spreading from north to south across the panhandle. Some uncertainty exists regarding snow totals and, particularly in the south, the transition from snow to rain. ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 9 inches possible. * WHERE...City of Hyder. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates are expected Friday evening into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
